# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of what this PR does.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring

## Related Issue
Closes #(issue number)

## Changes Made
- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Testing
Describe the tests you ran to verify your changes:
- [ ] `make test-unit` - All unit tests pass
- [ ] `make test-manual` - Manual tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] `make validate` - P1-P6 validation passes
- [ ] `make coverage` - Coverage maintained/improved

## Test Results
```
Paste test output here
```

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots showing the changes.

## Constituição Vértice v3.0 Compliance

### P1: Completude Obrigatória
- [ ] No TODOs, FIXMEs, or placeholders
- [ ] All code is complete and functional
- [ ] Tests included for all new functionality

### P2: Validação Preventiva
- [ ] External APIs validated before use (try/except)
- [ ] Dependencies checked with hasattr/getattr
- [ ] Clear error messages provided

### P3: Ceticismo Crítico
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] Edge cases tested
- [ ] Ranges and boundaries validated

### P4: Rastreabilidade Total
- [ ] Commit message is descriptive (>10 words)
- [ ] Docstrings added/updated
- [ ] Design decisions documented

### P5: Consciência Sistêmica
- [ ] Field names consistent with existing code
- [ ] Interfaces follow established patterns
- [ ] No inconsistencies between modules

### P6: Eficiência de Token
- [ ] Changes are complete and correct
- [ ] No multiple commits fixing the same issue
- [ ] Lessons learned documented (if fixing bug)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Additional Notes
Any additional information that reviewers should know.

---

**Framework:** Constituição Vértice v3.0 (P1-P6)
